p: The top three drugs—Nitazoxanide, Closantel Sodium, and Closantel—were identified with higher percentage CPE inhibition of 106.59 ± 2.79, 69.76 ± 6.06, and 80.64 ± 7.87%, respectively, at 10 μM concentration ( Table S1). Moreover, all three drugs showed a dose-dependent inhibition of CPV infection ( Figure 2).
